cleaned_text: Alter do Chão Non-Toxic Scented Candle / Aromatherapy Candle 9.5oz Scent Profile Opening with a refreshing and warm ocean breeze, ripened starfruit, and a touch of pink pepper. Salt and sun bleached driftwood grounds this feel good fragrance while the fresh scent of mimosa brings an uplifting accent. Poppies in bloom add an undeniable extravagance, followed by the earthy rich essence of golden cedar, warm amber, and rich tonka oud. It's a warm, yet refreshing fragrance that's perfect for any time of the year. Top: Ocean Breeze, Star Fruit, Pink Pepper Heart: Salty Driftwood, Mimosa, Poppy Base: Cedar, Amber and anti-anxiety** **Essential Oils Used: Orange Peel Oil from USA, Lemon Oil from Argentina and Eucalyptus Oil India** Size: 9.5 oz Burn Time: 74 hours Inspired by Alter do Chão in Pará Brazil, known as one of the most beautiful freshwater beaches in the world where the best natural tonka beans are found.
